mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trip_location_info WHERE area=#{area} AND thema_category=#{thema}
mapper.update: UPDATE trip_location_info SET like_score=(like_score+1) WHERE location_num=#{location_num}
UPDATE trip_location_info SET bad_score=(bad_score+1) WHERE location_num=#{location_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trip_location_info WHERE instr(location_name,+#{search}) > 0 or instr(area,+#{search}) > 0 or instr(location_addr,+#{search}) > 0 or instr(thema_category,+#{search}) > 0

SELECT * FROM (SELECT location_num, thema_category, location_name, location_addr, location_img1, location_img2, location_img3, location_img4, detail_info, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, location_web, like_score, normal_score, bad_score, open_time, close_time, area, ROWNUM rnum FROM trip_location_info ) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_location_info(location_num, thema_category, location_name, location_addr, location_img1, location_img2, location_img3, location_img4, detail_info, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, location_web, like_score, normal_score, bad_score, open_time, close_time, area) VALUES(location_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{thema_category}, #{location_name}, #{location_addr}, #{location_img1}, #{location_img2}, #{location_img3}, #{location_img4}, #{detail_info}, #{x_coordinate}, #{y_coordinate}, #{location_web}, 0, 0, 0, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{area})
